description.fr: {%FightStarted} {value:Equipment.882.skill,percent} supplémentaires de vos bonus d'{%AT} s'appliquent aux dégâts de vos sorts
description.en: {%FightStarted} {value:Equipment.882.skill,percent} extra from your {%AT} bonus applies to your spell damage.
description.es: {%FightStarted} Un {value:Equipment.882.skill,percent} extra de tus bonus de {%AT} se aplican a los daños de tus hechizos.
description.de: {%FightStarted} Zusätzliche {value:Equipment.882.skill,percent} deiner {%AT,plural:two}-Boni werden auf deinen Zauberschaden angewendet.
description.pt: {%FightStarted} {value:Equipment.882.skill,percent} adicionais dos seus bônus de {%AT} são aplicados aos danos dos seus feitiços.
